description:
Calibre 7.20 open-source ebook manager is now available for download with a new default PDF Input engine, new firmware for the Tolino Shine 5 reader, and other changes. Here's what's new!

The post Calibre 7.20 Adds New PDF Input Engine, Supports New Tolino Shine 5 Firmware appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Calibre 7.20 Adds New PDF Input Engine, Supports New Tolino Shine 5 Firmware
